configurationProperties.name: Black Duck Project Name
configurationProperties.description: The Black Duck Project Name the scan will be mapped to in the Black Duck UI

configurationProperties.name: Black Duck Project Version
configurationProperties.description: The Black Duck Project Version. Leave blank to use a value generated by CodePipeline.

configurationProperties.name: S3 Bucket Name
configurationProperties.description: The S3 bucket where the Black Duck Risk Report PDF will be published. This can also be the S3 bucket where the application was built to.

configurationProperties.name: S3 Bucket Region
configurationProperties.description: The Region where the S3 bucket specified above lives.

configurationProperties.name: ECR Region Name
configurationProperties.description: If using ECR, specify the AWS ECR region where your images will be pulled from. Leave blank if the images are not in ECR.

configurationProperties.name: Image Name
configurationProperties.description: If scanning a Docker image, specify the image name and tag to pull and scan. Leave blank if not scanning any Docker images.
